SDG_GOAL: Objective 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its repercussions2
SDG_TARGET: 13.1 Build resilience and adaptation capacities in all countries to climate hazards and climate-related natural disasters
SDG_INDICATOR: 13.1.1 Number of people who died, disappeared or directly affected during disasters, per 100,000 people
CONTACT_ORGANISATION: Ministry of Public Security and Disaster Management
CONTACT_FUNCT: SDG focal point within the Ministry
STAT_CONC_DEF: Number of people who died, disappeared or directly affected in disasters, per 100,000 people
INST_MANDATE: The Ministerial departments are the members of the SSN whose mission is to collect, process and disseminate the data of their sector.
RATIONALE: The indicator is relevant because it allows monitoring of the Sendhai Framework
REC_USE_LIM: The completeness of this indicator depends on the regular collection of disaster data
DATA_COMP: Count of dead, missing or directly affected by disasters, per 100,000 people
DATA_VALIDATION: Validation is carried out at two levels: Internal level and at CTIS level
COVERAGE: The indicator is available at national level
COMPARABILITY: The indicator can be compared to other indicators at the international level
indicator_name: Proportion d’indicateurs du développement durable établis à l’échelle nationale, ventilés de manière exhaustive en fonction de la cible conformément aux Principes fondamentaux de la statistique officielle
